component.name: Firmware Manager
component.summary: GTK application for managing firmware updates

description.p: The Firmware Manager is a simple GTK application for managing firmware updates. It sources information on available firmware updates from both fwupd and system76-firmware, and then displays that information seamlessly in one interface. Only devices which are managed by either service are displayed in the UI.

It is not required to have either fwupd or system76-firmware installed to use the application. The application will only display devices which have been discovered from services accessible on the system.

The application monitors USB hotplug events, and will refresh the firmware list when USB devices are inserted or removed. A refresh button is also included in the UI to manually reload the devices in the UI.
